title: Who is in charge of choosing the music played at Chinese McDonald's restaurants? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's an answered question on China's version of Quora. 麦当劳、肯德基餐厅里播放的歌曲是怎么选出来的？ - 知乎 For the Quorians who can't read Chinese here I translate one of the replies. "In McDonald our music is made by the Marketing Department. There are two ways for the restaurants to get it. Some fancier restaurants have direct access to the music from the headquarters; the other restaurants just play the CDs produced by the Marketing Department. The tempo and genre of the music will be decided upon the time of the day and also it varies among different types of restaurants. For instance, the McCafe will play slow-tempo, elegant-style Jazz music in the afternoons. Of course all the music that McDonald played are authorized editions and we've already paid the Background Music Copyright Fee to the Music Copyright Society of China."
